body: my new OC is going to be inspired by Siknum, I just love how she has that short hair, and these (things I forgot how to say in English) in her arms, but my OC will probably have... a smaller horn, and it will be the right one, the hands are going to be less scary, (I'm no vanillafag but these hands creep me out [the ones from the cover]) and the way the (flesh? I dunno) skin is kinda muscled (these knees and arms with a lot of layers or something is strange to me) but overall except for the cover IT'S A NEW FAVOURITE
When i read morisugi stuff i feel like i'm getting raped too, for some reason. It is pretty cool too
Love equality. Even monster girls, the cute kind
